reviewText: Director Martin Scorcese, and acting genius Robert De Niro have privelaged the silver screen with some of the most powerful movies in hollywood history. Their films have been considered the best of all time. Together they have won numerous academy awards. Any collection would be complete with any  De Niro/Scorcese film.

The movies Goodfellas, meanstreets, and raging bull really show just how good of an actor Robert De niro is.  All three movies were directed and acted to perfection and are some of the best movies to ever be made.  The addiction to these movies is inevitable there are no better movies out there.
